subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort was built by Raja Rai Singh in 16th century?
question_hi: 16वीं सदी में राजा राय सिंह ने किस मंगल बनाया।
explanation_en: Kumbhalgarh Fort was built by Rana Kumbha in the 16th century.
explanation_hi: 16वीं सदी में Rana Kumbha ne Kumbhalgarh Fort ko banaya hai.
